jStrg.network_management.storage_management.core

Interface Location

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ILocationStandardValues
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AmazonS3Bucket, GoogleCloudBucket, MasterCache, StorageCell, StorageServer

    public interface Location
extends ILocationStandardValues
    StorageCell backend interface, two methods: write_file and stage_file_to_cache are the ones you want to use

    • Method Detail

      • make_file_persistent

        static java.util.Set<StorageCell> make_file_persistent(java.io.File _file,
                                                       FileVersion _version)
        Takes File object and writes the file returned by get_real_file() to storage backends. Typical the file that is written to cache.
        Parameters:
        _file - file to write
        _version - file to write
        Returns:
        return list with location id's where the file was written

      • make_file_persistent_internal

        static StorageCell make_file_persistent_internal(java.io.File _file,
                                                 FileVersion _version,
                                                 Location.TYPE _type)
        simple upload to a type of location, no dedup - mut be checked before!
        Parameters:
        _file - javaio file on filesystem directly accessible by system
        _version - const var, used to pass checksum and size
        _type - of location
        Returns:
        location written to

      • stage_file_to_cache

        static java.io.File stage_file_to_cache(FileVersion _fileversion)
        gets the data for a file and writes it to a available cache location. Updates the Object, when returned true then get_real_file() of File objects returns the cache object.
        Parameters:
        _fileversion - File object to retrieve
        Returns:
        the file that is written to cache

        Returns:

      • get_cache_location_for_size

        static Location get_cache_location_for_size(long _size)
        choose cache location with most free space
        Parameters:
        _size - size that is needed
        Returns:
        Location, null of none found

      • file_checksum

        static java.lang.String file_checksum(java.io.File _file)
        old but can be used later to verify. This is now done "on-the-fly". Used by tests.
        Parameters:
        _file - file on filesystem
        Returns:
        checksum

      • set_maintenance

        void set_maintenance(boolean m_maintenance)
        Faulty Locations are set o maintenance, so that no error spam would be produced.
        Parameters:
        m_maintenance - true for maintenance mode

      • write_file

        StorageCell write_file(java.io.File _file,
                       FileVersion _version)
        Writes the file to user's locations. Needs the _version to determine user and checksum of the file for deduplication (const var)
        Parameters:
        _file - file that is written to a cache location.
        _version - the fileversion to make persistent
        Returns:
        id of location which got the file

        check if a file is available at location
        Parameters:
        _checksum - expected resource
        Returns:
        found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - internal

      • delete

        boolean delete(java.lang.String _checksum)
        deletes file at location, WARNING, do not use unless you are aware of internal effects. Better use Fileversion.delete();
        Parameters:
        _checksum - resource to delete
        Returns:
        success
        See Also:
        FileVersion

        Parameters:

        _destination - where the file will e placed
